Descriptions.ShortDescription: Real-time dithering analysis with quality assessment
Descriptions.LongDescription:
Comprehensive dithering analysis plugin with real-time statistics, visual charts, and experimental quality assessment. Features include pixel drift tracking, settle time monitoring, and advanced pattern evaluation using Centered L₂ Discrepancy, Voronoi tessellation, and drizzle coverage metrics. Direct PHD2 integration for accurate pixel shift detection.

# Key Features

* Real-time dither settle time tracking
* X/Y pixel drift visualization
* Statistical analysis (avg, median, std dev, min/max)
* Success rate monitoring
* Quality Assessment Module
  - Centered L₂ Discrepancy
  - Voronoi tessellation analysis
  - Drizzle coverage metrics (1×/2×/3×)
  - Combined quality scoring
  - Pattern recommendations
* Direct PHD2 integration
* JSON export functionality

# Requirements

* N.I.N.A. 3.0 or higher
* .NET 8.0 Runtime
* PHD2 or N.I.N.A. Direct Guider

# Getting Help

Help for this plugin may be found in the **#plugin-discussions** channel on the NINA project [Discord chat server](https://discord.com/invite/rWRbVbw) or by filing an issue report at this plugin's [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Thierrytsch/NINA-DitherStatistics/issues).
